Create a sock subscription box that delivers a new pair of socks every month based on your preferences.
Develop a line of sock-related products such as sock holders, sock warmers, and sock repair kits.
Host a virtual sock-themed party or event, where participants can learn about the history and importance of socks, and engage in fun sock-related activities.
